TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_kuku'_nu_cilal-sakatusa_a_lukyaw, title = kuku'_nu_cilal-sakatusa_a_lukyaw, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/kuku'_nu_cilal-sakatusa_a_lukyaw} }

S.FORM: sakatusa a lukyaw-mapalaw ku babalaki u mapalaway, mudikec tu ku mapalaway sapatungus tu babalaki, mududuc naculilan nu babalaki. mupateng tu sapatungus, amalingatu tu mutakus tu babalaki, mamin tu mutakus atahkal tu mapalaway. tatayna amin sakacacay: maluk ku katuuday sakatusa: mapulong mutakus sakatulu: midudung tu mapalaway, mitakus tu babalaki. sakasepat: mikukay tu babalaki

sakatosa a lokyaw-mapalaw ko babalaki o mapalaway, modikec to ko mapalaway sapatongos to babalaki, mododoc nacolilan no babalaki. mopateng to sapatongos, amalingato to motakos to babalaki, mamin to motakos atahkal to mapalaway. tatayna amin sakacacay: malok ko katooday sakatosa: mapolong motakos sakatolo: midodong to mapalaway, mitakos to babalaki. sakasepat: mikokay to babalaki
